name: Hot Shot (itch) (wolfpack300)
description:
Welcome to Hot Shot, a top-down puzzle platformer - roll the ball through the level without falling off while fleeing the flames that are right on your heels!

This game was created for VimJam 3, with the required focus of "MULTI-USE" and theme of "TURN UP THE HEAT," and was the first made by the developer.

Controls:
Move - WASD
Use/Place Tar Barrel - Left Click

Assets Used:
Kenney's Input Prompts - https://kenney.nl/assets/input-prompts-pixel-16
Shackman's Fire Animation - https://github.com/ShackMan2000/TutorialTilemap
Ahmet Gencoglu 's Soccer Ball - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/low-polygon-soccer-ball-84382
